alert.note: Alert for Kosciusko (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 25 at 3:52PM EDT until June 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... Kosciusko County in north central Indiana... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding in the advisory area. Up to two inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Warsaw, Nappanee, Winona Lake, Syracuse, Milford, North Webster, Pierceton, Mentone, Etna Green, Leesburg, Claypool, Burket, Big Barbee Lake, Ridinger Lake, Monoquet, Hoffman Lake, Atwood, Irish Lake, Beaver Dam Lake and Lake Wawasee. Additional rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
